description: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via RUNDLL LAUNCHER
name: Invoke-Obfuscation RUNDLL LAUNCHER - System
query: winlog.channel:System AND (event.code:7045 AND (winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*rundll32.exe* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*shell32.dll* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*shellexec_rundll* AND winlog.event_data.ImagePath:*powershell*) AND winlog.provider_name:Service\ Control\ Manager)
author: Timur Zinniatullin, oscd.community
